explains: n. 无穷无尽的时间；永恒，永久；永生；未来，来世；死

sentences.en: I have always found the thought of eternity terrifying.
sentences.cn: 我总觉得永生的想法很可怕。

sentences.en: It keeps things alive from itself, so the problem with art is its eternity.
sentences.cn: 它让事物脱离它本身而永存，所以艺术的问题在于它的永恒。

sentences.en: The war continued for an eternity.
sentences.cn: 那场战争持续了极长的时间。
